mapper.select: select pblanc_sport_sn, pblanc_sn, pblanc_sport_man_sn, pblanc_sport_cn from recruit_apply where pblanc_sport_sttus_code =0 and pblanc_sport_man_sn =#{mber_sn}
mapper.insert: /* insertRecruitApply 공고 참여 신청 */ insert into recruit_apply (pblanc_sport_sn, pblanc_sn, pblanc_sport_man_sn, pblanc_sport_cn, pblanc_sport_role, pblanc_sport_de, pblanc_sport_sttus_code) values (recruitapplyseq.nextval, #{pblanc_sn}, #{pblanc_sport_man_sn}, #{pblanc_sport_cn}, #{pblanc_sport_role}, to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '0')
mapper.select: /* selectApplyRecruitList 내가 신청한 공고 목록 조회 */ select a.pblanc_sport_sn, a.pblanc_sn, a.pblanc_sport_role, b.pblanc_clos_de, a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code, b.pblanc_sj, c.prjct_sj from recruit_apply a, recruit b, project c where a.pblanc_sn = b.pblanc_sn and b.prjct_sn = c.prjct_sn and pblanc_sport_man_sn = #{pblanc_sport_man_sn} and (a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code = '0' or a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code ='1') order by b.pblanc_clos_de desc

/* myRecruitApplyListByPblancSn 내가 작성한 공고 신청자 중 면접 이전 목록 조회*/ select pblanc_sport_sn, pblanc_sport_role, (select mber_ncnm from member where mber_sn = pblanc_sport_man_sn) as mber_ncnm, pblanc_sport_de from recruit_apply where pblanc_sn=#{pblanc_sn} and pblanc_sport_sttus_code = '0' order by pblanc_sport_de desc

/*recruitMeetingListByPblancSn 내가 작성한 공고의 면접 목록 조회*/ select a.pblanc_sport_sn, a.pblanc_sport_role, (select mber_ncnm from member where mber_sn = a.pblanc_sport_man_sn) as mber_ncnm, a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code, a.pblanc_meeting_time, (select prjct_sj from project where prjct_sn = b.prjct_sn) as prjct_sj, b.pblanc_sj from recruit_apply a, recruit b where a.pblanc_sn = b.pblanc_sn and b.pblanc_wrter = #{mber_sn} and (a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code = '2'or a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code ='3') order by a.pblanc_meeting_time desc

/*meetingResultList 내가 작성한 공고의 면접 결과 목록 조회*/ select a.pblanc_sport_sn, a.pblanc_sport_role, (select mber_ncnm from member where mber_sn = a.pblanc_sport_man_sn) as mber_ncnm, a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code, a.pblanc_meeting_time, (select prjct_sj from project where prjct_sn = b.prjct_sn) as prjct_sj, b.pblanc_sj from recruit_apply a, recruit b where a.pblanc_sn = b.pblanc_sn and b.pblanc_wrter = #{mber_sn} and (pblanc_sport_sttus_code = '4'or pblanc_sport_sttus_code ='5') order by a.pblanc_meeting_time desc

/*applyMeetingListByMberSn 내가 신청한 면접 목록 조회*/ select a.pblanc_sport_sn, a.pblanc_sport_role, (select mber_ncnm from member where mber_sn = a.pblanc_sport_man_sn) as mber_ncnm, a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code, a.pblanc_meeting_time, (select prjct_sj from project where prjct_sn = b.prjct_sn) as prjct_sj, b.pblanc_sj from recruit_apply a, recruit b where a.pblanc_sn = b.pblanc_sn and a.pblanc_sport_man_sn = #{mber_sn} and (a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code = '2'or a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code ='3') order by a.pblanc_meeting_time desc

/*myMeetingResultList 내가 신청한 공고의 면접 결과 목록 조회*/ select a.pblanc_sport_sn, a.pblanc_sport_role, c.mber_ncnm, a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code, a.pblanc_meeting_time, d.prjct_sj, b.pblanc_sj, a.pblanc_sport_de, b.pblanc_sn from recruit_apply a, recruit b, member c, project d where a.pblanc_sn = b.pblanc_sn and c.mber_sn = a.pblanc_sport_man_sn and d.prjct_sn = b.prjct_sn and a.pblanc_sport_man_sn = #{mber_sn} and (a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code = '4'or a.pblanc_sport_sttus_code ='5') order by a.pblanc_sport_de desc
